pages.text: $(item)Melonsicle$() is a Vegetable Food item cooked in the $(pot)Crock Pot$() by combining at least 1 $(item)Melon$() or 1 $(item)Melon Slice$(), 1 $(thing)Frozen$() item, and 1 $(item)Stick$() or $(item)Bamboo$(). No $(thing)Meats$(), $(thing)Vegetables$(), or $(thing)Eggs$() should be added. It takes 10 seconds to cook.
